txt.en: Burn twisted-pale roots in the Garth of Angáth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

As you explore the Garth of Angáth, you notice a number of pale, twisted roots thrashing in the gardens.

These white roots seem a twisted mockery of the White Tree of Gondor, but it is unlikely they possess such a lineage as the seedling of Nimloth, which once grew tall and mighty in Minas Ithil and was burned many years ago.

Even so, you would be wise to set flame to these wild roots and put an end to the vile creations of the Nazgûl.

Twisted pale-roots can be found in the Garth of Angáth in the Circle of Despair.\n\nYou have encountered twisted pale-roots in the Garth of Angáth and should burn them, lest their corruption linger in Minas Morgul.
Twisted pale-roots can be found in the Garth of Angáth in the Circle of Despair.
Pale, twisted roots of an unknown lineage grow within the Garth of Angáth and threaten the unwary.
Burned twisted-pale roots in the Garth of Angáth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
